docs.snippet: At the United States Open this week in Pinehurst, N.C., footprints in sandy areas not considered bunkers may end up posing unofficial hazards for players....
docs.lead_paragraph: At the United States Open this week in Pinehurst, N.C., footprints in sandy areas not considered bunkers may end up posing unofficial hazards for players.
docs.abstract: Pinehurst Resort and Country Club in North Carolina, site of 2014 United States Open, offers as much as 50 sandy acres that remain intentionally ungroomed, making for highly unusual circumstance of pro golfers playing shots from the imprints of shoes gouged into sand; US Open players say it is impossible to practice hitting such shots, and some say the unpredictability could enhance the Open's appeal.

headline.main: Pinehurst’s Challenges at U.S. Open Will Include Footprints

docs.snippet: Clint Ramos costumed “Here Lies Love,” about a first lady drunk on politics....

docs.abstract: Clint Ramos, costume designer for Here Lies Love, singer David Byrne's musical biography of Imelda Marcos, has been tasked with portraying her rags-to-riches transformation, ambition and mythical status through clothing.

headline.main: Costuming Imelda Marcos in ‘Here Lies Love’
headline.print_headline: Making Imelda, Above the Shoes, Shimmy and Shimmer
